verses.verse: וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּ֑יו <S%H8478><s%> his place וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> in his stead and strengthened עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> himself against Israel

וַיִּ֨תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And he placed חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> forces בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֑וֹת <S%H1219><s%> in all the fenced וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and set נְצִיבִים֙ <S%H5333><s%> garrisons בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and in the cities אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לָכַ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> had taken אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> which Asa אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was with יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> was with Jehoshaphat כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because הָלַ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> because he walked בְּדַרְכֵ֞י <S%H1870><s%> ways דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> of his father הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> in the first וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not דָרַ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> and sought לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> not unto Baalim

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֵֽאלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> to the [LORD] God אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> of his father דָּרָ֔שׁ <S%H1875><s%> But sought וּבְמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> in his commandments הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walked וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> and did not כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> and not after the doings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּ֨כֶן <S%H3559><s%> stablished יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַיִּתְּנ֧וּ <S%H5414><s%> brought כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> and all Judah מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> presents לִיהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <S%H3092><s%> to Jehoshaphat וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֥וֹ עֹֽשֶׁר־ <S%H6239><s%> and he had riches וְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance

וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <S%H1361><s%> was lifted up לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> And his heart בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and again הֵסִ֛יר <S%H5493><s%> moreover he took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֥וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <S%H842><s%> and groves מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> out of Judah פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁל֜וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> Also in the third לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign שָׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent לְשָׂרָיו֙ <S%H8269><s%> to his princes לְבֶן־ חַ֙יִל֙ <S%H1134><s%> [even] to Benhail וּלְעֹבַדְיָ֣ה <S%H5662><s%> and to Obadiah וְלִזְכַרְיָ֔ה <S%H2148><s%> and to Zechariah וְלִנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> and to Nethaneel וּלְמִיכָיָ֑הוּ <S%H4322><s%> and to Michaiah לְלַמֵּ֖ד <S%H3925><s%> to teach בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְעִמָּהֶ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> them הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> And with them [he sent] Levites שְֽׁמַֽעְיָ֡הוּ <S%H8098><s%> [even] Shemaiah וּנְתַנְיָ֡הוּ <S%H5418><s%> and Nethaniah וּזְבַדְיָ֡הוּ <S%H2069><s%> and Zebadiah וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֡ל <S%H6214><s%> and Asahel [וּשְׁמִרִימֹות כ] (וּשְׁמִֽירָמֹ֡ות <S%H8070><s%> Shemiramoth ק) וִֽיהוֹנָתָן֩ <S%H3083><s%> and Jehonathan וַאֲדֹ֨נִיָּ֧הוּ <S%H138><s%> and Adonijah וְטֽוֹבִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2900><s%> and Tobijah וְט֥וֹב אֲדוֹנִיָּ֖ה <S%H2899><s%> and Tobadonijah הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> Levites וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <S%H5973><s%> them אֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> and with them Elishama וִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3088><s%> and Jehoram הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> priests

וַֽיְלַמְּדוּ֙ <S%H3925><s%> And they taught בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וְעִ֨מָּהֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> with סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> and [had] the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> of the law יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <S%H5437><s%> with them and went about בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> throughout all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַֽיְלַמְּד֖וּ <S%H3925><s%> and taught בָּעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become פַּ֣חַד <S%H6343><s%> And the fear יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> was on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> fell upon all the kingdoms הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the lands אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not נִלְחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> so that they made no war עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יְהוֹשָׁפָֽט׃ <S%H3092><s%> against Jehoshaphat

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> Also [some] of the Philistines מְבִיאִ֧ים <S%H935><s%> brought לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> presents וְכֶ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver מַשָּׂ֑א <S%H4853><s%> and tribute גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> again הָֽעַרְבִיאִ֗ים <S%H6163><s%> and the Arabians מְבִיאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> brought לוֹ֙ צֹ֕אן <S%H6629><s%> him flocks אֵילִ֔ים <S%H352><s%> rams שִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> seven אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁבַ֣ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּתְיָשִׁ֕ים <S%H8495><s%> he goats שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred פ

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> waxed וְגָדֵ֖ל <S%H1432><s%> great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> exceedingly וַיִּ֧בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and he built בִּֽיהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah בִּירָנִיּ֖וֹת <S%H1003><s%> castles וְעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and cities מִסְכְּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4543><s%> of store

וּמְלָאכָ֥ה <S%H4399><s%> business רַבָּ֛ה <S%H7227><s%> And he had much הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> had ל֖וֹ בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאַנְשֵׁ֧י <S%H376><s%> and מִלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> of war גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> mighty men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> [were] in Jerusalem

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another פְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> And these [are] the numbers לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of them according to the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Of Judah שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the captains אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> of thousands עַדְנָ֣ה <S%H5734><s%> Adnah הַשָּׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְעִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> and with him mighty men חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> to him [was] Jehohanan הַשָּׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> the captain וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> two מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> and with him two hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> And next עֲמַסְיָ֣ה <S%H6007><s%> him [was] Amasiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִכְרִ֔י <S%H2147><s%> of Zichri הַמִּתְנַדֵּ֖ב <S%H5068><s%> who willingly offered לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> himself unto the LORD וְעִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> two מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> and with him two hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> of valour ס

וּמִ֨ן־ <S%H4480><s%> and of בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> And of Benjamin גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty man חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour אֶלְיָדָ֑ע <S%H450><s%> Eliada וְעִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with נֹֽשְׁקֵי־ <S%H5401><s%> and with him armed men קֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> with bow וּמָגֵ֖ן <S%H4043><s%> and shield מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> And next יְהוֹזָבָ֑ד <S%H3075><s%> him [was] Jehozabad וְעִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with מֵאָֽה־ <S%H3967><s%> and with him an hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֥י <S%H2502><s%> ready prepared צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> for the war ס

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <S%H8334><s%> These waited אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> on the king מִלְּבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> apart אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> put הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> beside [those] whom the king בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְצָ֖ר <S%H4013><s%> in the fenced בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> throughout all Judah פ
